articles.title: ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ Production Paused For Week Due To Tom Holland Concussion; Filming To Resume Monday - Deadline
articles.description: Spider-Man: Brand New Day will pause production for a week after Tom Holland suffered a mild concussion on a London set Friday.
articles.content: EXCLUSIVE: Sources tell Deadline that the Sony/Marvel Studios’ movie Spider-Man: Brand New Daywill pause production for a week after Tom Holland suffered a mild concussion on a London set Friday. The… [+1904 chars]
